title: Grab this gigantic, 1600W 80+ Platinum power supply for just 33 cents per watt Seasonic's Prime TX 1600W is down to just $532
summary: Seasonic's Prime TX-1600 is a high-end power supply option with native PCIe 5.0 and ATX 3.1 compatibility. It's fully modular, 80+ Platinum rated, and features quiet operation. This makes it suitable for powering any high-performance component.
insight: High-end power supply for demanding builds at an affordable price

title: OpenClaw-fueled ordering frenzy creates Apple Mac shortage delivery for high Unified Memory units now ranges from 6 days to 6 weeks
summary: The Unified Memory architecture in Apple Macs drives high demand for high-memory models, resulting in order lead times ranging from 6 days to 6 weeks.
insight: High demand for high-memory Macs fuels shortage and prolonged delivery times.

title: xSDR A tiny M.2 2230 SDR module with Artix-7 FPGA and LMS7002M RFIC (Crowdfunding)
summary: The xSDR is a tiny M.2 SDR module offering 2x2 MIMO support and a wide frequency range, built with an Artix-7 FPGA and LMS7002M RFIC for applications like cellular research, spectrum analysis, and satellite tracking.
insight: Enabling compact, high-performance SDR solutions for various research and development applications.

title: LR2021 LoRa Plus board combines Semtech LR2021 and Nordic nRF54L15 for high-speed FLRC and LoRa connectivity
summary: The LR2021 LoRa Plus development kit combines Semtech's LR2021 transceiver chip with Nordic's nRF54L15, enabling high-speed FLRC and LoRa connectivity up to 2.6 Mbps. The board supports LoRa Gen 4 technology and additional short-range protocols like NFC and Bluetooth LE 6.0. It features a 0.96-inch OLED display, multiple expansion connectors, and a USB Type-C port for power and debugging.
insight: Enabling high-speed LoRaWAN connectivity with enhanced processing capabilities
